Description_lang: The Hungering Destroyer cloaks all players in consuming energies, absorbing the next $331232s1 damage.When the cast completes, the Hungering Destroyer consumes all of the remaining absorbs and shields itself for $s1% of the total value consumed and inflicts $329468s1 Shadow damage to all players.While shielded, the Hungering Destroyer's gains an additional $331304s2 energy every $331304t2 sec.
